word.description: {三文治} is a [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *sandwich* and also similar to the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *salmon* {三文魚} *sāam màhn yùh*, differing only in the last character.

images.place: Lucky House Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: A Hong Kong-style sandwich. Sandwiches are a standard offering of [Hong Kong-style cafes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cha_chaan_teng), typically served with white bread and the crust trimmed.

word.description: {公司} is *company* (the corporate kind), and {三文治} is a [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *sandwich*. So 公司三文治 is *company sandwich*.

images.place: Lucky House Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description:
A Hong Kong-style club sandwich.

**Personal Note**

I used to order this frequently from the company cafeteria when I worked in Hong Kong, largely because it was relatively easy to pronounce (sort of rhymes).

word.description: {煙肉} is *bacon*, {生菜} is *lettuce*, {番茄} is [tomato](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomato), and {三文治} is a [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *sandwich*. So 煙肉生菜番茄三文治 is *bacon lettuce tomato sandwich*.

description:
A bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich.

**Personal Note**

For a sandwich with a short English name, [BLT](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BLT) has a really long Chinese name, so in Hong Kong I would order this in the company cafeteria when I really wanted to practice my pronunciation..

word.description: {蛋} is *egg*, {牛} is *cow* (but here it's short for beef {牛肉}), and {治} is the tail end of the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *sandwich* ({三文治}). So 蛋牛治 is *egg cow sandwich*.

images.place: Lucky House Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: A Hong Kong-style sandwich with corned beef and scrambled egg.

word.description: {午餐} is *lunch* ({午 is *noon*, and {餐} is *meal*), and {肉} is *meat*, so {午餐肉} is *lunch meat*, i.e. spam. {蛋} is *egg*, and {三文治} is the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for *sandwich*, so altogether 午餐肉蛋三文治 is *lunch meat egg sandwich*.

description: A Hong Kong-style sandwich with pan-fried spam and scrambled egg.
